---------------------------------------------
R4 TEST 


 16 * -8  = 200 - (-128)  = 328 = 0x148


01010
R10 gets 2^ in its slices.

LI R10 with 0000000011001000 at index 0 - 000
LI R10 with 0000000011001000 at index 2 - 010
LI R10 with 0000000011001000 at index 4 - 100
LI R10 with 0000000011001000 at index 6 - 110


00101
R5 gets 2^ in its slices.

LI R5 with 0000000000000001 at index 0 - 000
LI R5 with 1111111111111000 at index 1 - 001
LI R5 with 0000000000000001 at index 2 - 010
LI R5 with 1111111111111000 at index 3 - 011
LI R5 with 0000000000000001 at index 4 - 100
LI R5 with 1111111111111000 at index 5 - 101
LI R5 with 0000000000000001 at index 6 - 110
LI R5 with 1111111111111000 at index 7 - 111



00001
R1 gets 2^ in its slices.

LI R1 with 0000000000010000 at index  1 - 001
LI R1 with 0000000000010000 at index  3 - 011
LI R1 with 0000000000010000 at index  5 - 101
LI R1 with 0000000000010000 at index  7 - 111
 
00000
R0 gets result.

Opcode
1001100001001010101000000

program:

0000000000001100100001010 
0010000000001100100001010 
0100000000001100100001010 
0110000000001100100001010 
0000000000000000000100101 
0001111111111111100000101 
0010000000000000000100101 
0011111111111111100000101 
0100000000000000000100101 
0101111111111111100000101 
0110000000000000000100101 
0111111111111111100000101 
0001000000000001000000001 
0011000000000001000000001 
0101000000000001000000001 
0111000000000001000000001 
1001100001001010101000000








passes.

---------------------------------------------------
